data.comment: The match is underway in Yokohama.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 1, Takuto Okabe awards the home team a throw-in.
Shimizu's Yuito Suzuki breaks free at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Takuto Okabe awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Yokohama FC's Reo Yasunaga misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Shimizu at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Junior Dutra (Shimizu) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Yokohama FC defenders.
In the minute 4, Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In Yokohama, Yokohama FC push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Goal! Shota Kaneko gives Shimizu a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 5, Yuito Suzuki instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Junior Dutra extends Shimizu's lead to 0-2.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 9, Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Takuto Okabe signals a Yokohama FC throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Yokohama FC just outside Shimizu's area.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Yokohama FC are coming forward and Masakazu Tashiro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 19, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Yokohama.
In the minute 22, Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Important block from the Yokohama FC defence as Junior Dutra fires in a strike for Shimizu.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 31, Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Takuto Okabe signals a throw-in for Yokohama FC, close to Shimizu's area.
In the minute 35, Junior Dutra gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
Katsuhiro Nakayama (Yokohama FC) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick Shimizu.
Goal! Shimizu extend their lead to 0-3 through Ryo Takeuchi.
Great play from Ryo Okui to set up the goal.
In the minute 40, Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Shimizu at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 43, Takuto Okabe awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, At NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Yokohama.
The second-half is underway in Yokohama.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 46, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Koki Saito is on a sub for Takuya Matsuura for Yokohama FC.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Eijiro Takeda with Maguinho. This is the second substitution made today by Takahiro Shimotaira.
Yokohama FC make their third substitution with Yutaro Hakamata replacing Takaaki Shichi.
Yokohama FC are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Yokohama FC.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Takuto Okabe awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Takuto Okabe awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
Shimizu drives forward and Yuito Suzuki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 56, Yokohama FC are back in the match in Yokohama. Tatsuki Seko has scored to make it 1-3.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
In the minute 60, Yokohama FC's Tatsuki Seko gets in a shot on goal at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Shimizu are pushing forward but Yuito Suzuki's finish is wide of the goal.
Junior Dutra of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 62, Yokohama FC have a dangerous throw-in.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's first substitution at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium with Kenta Nishizawa replacing Yusuke Goto.
The away team replace Junior Dutra with Yasufumi Nishimura.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Takuto Okabe signals a Yokohama FC throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Shimizu.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
Can Yokohama FC capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama FC in Yokohama.
In the minute 76, Teerasil Dangda is replacing Yuito Suzuki for the away team.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
Takuto Okabe awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Shimizu needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Yokohama FC.
In the minute 82, Yuki Kusano is replacing Katsuhiro Nakayama for the home team.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yokohama FC are coming forward and Yuki Kusano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Shimizu at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Throw-in for Shimizu at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Yokohama FC have a dangerous throw-in.
Takuto Okabe signals a throw-in for Shimizu, close to Yokohama FC's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Shimizu are in shooting range from this free kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Yokohama FC make their fifth substitution with Yusuke Minagawa replacing Kosuke Saito.
Peter Cklamovski (Shimizu) is making a fourth substitution, with Hwang Seok-Ho replacing Kota Miyamoto.
